languages.text: Несколько минут по вокс-связи звучат радостные возгласы бойцов, смешанные с счастливым плачем. Приглушенные звуки обрывает шелест помех — пытаясь восстановить связь с кораблем, Вигдис меняет положение переключателей, тумблеров и рычагов.

traits.locale_text: Несколько минут по вокс-связи звучат радостные возгласы бойцов, смешанные с счастливым плачем. Приглушенные звуки обрывает шелест помех — пытаясь восстановить связь с кораблем, Вигдис меняет положение переключателей, тумблеров и рычагов.

languages.text: For a few minutes, joyful cries and sobs of the soldiers are heard over the vox. The muted sounds are suddenly interrupted by heavy static. Vigdis starts fumbling with the switches, tumblers, and levers, trying to re-establish communication.
languages.original_text: Несколько минут по вокс-связи звучат радостные возгласы бойцов, смешанные с счастливым плачем. Приглушенные звуки обрывает шелест помех — пытаясь восстановить связь с кораблем, Вигдис меняет положение переключателей, тумблеров и рычагов.

traits.locale_text: For a few minutes, happy cries and sobs of the soldiers are heard over the vox. The muted sounds are suddenly interrupted by heavy static. Vigdis starts fumbling with the switches, tumblers, and levers, trying to reestablish communication.

For a few minutes, happy cries and sobs of the soldiers are heard over the vox. The muted sounds are suddenly interrupted by heavy static. Vigdis starts fumbling with the switches, tumblers, and levers, trying to re-establish communication.

For a few minutes, happy cries and sobs of the soldiers are heard over the vox. The muted sounds are suddenly interrupted by heavy static. Vigdis starts fumbling with the switches, tumblers, and levers, trying to re-establish communication.

For a few minutes, joyful cries and sobs of the soldiers are heard over the vox. The muted sounds are suddenly interrupted by heavy static. Vigdis starts fumbling with the switches, tumblers, and levers, trying to re-establish communication.

languages.text: 在接下来的几分钟里，士兵们喜悦的抽泣声充满了整个音阵频道。在那之后，微弱的声音突然被强烈的静电声打断了。维格迪斯急切地操作着开关、滚轮与拉杆，试图重新建立通讯连接。
languages.original_text: For a few minutes, joyful cries and sobs of the soldiers are heard over the vox. The muted sounds are suddenly interrupted by heavy static. Vigdis starts fumbling with the switches, tumblers, and levers, trying to re-establish communication.

traits.locale_text: 在接下来的几分钟里，士兵们喜悦的抽泣声充满了整个音阵频道。在那之后，微弱的声音突然被强烈的静电声打断了。维格迪斯急切地操作着开关、滚轮与拉杆，试图重新建立通讯连接。

languages.text: 数分間、兵士たちの楽し気な叫び声とすすり泣きがヴォクスから聞こえてくる。静かな音が突然、大きな雑音で中断される。ヴィグディスはコミュニケーションを再確立しようと、スイッチ、タンブラー、レバーをいじり始める。
languages.original_text: For a few minutes, joyful cries and sobs of the soldiers are heard over the vox. The muted sounds are suddenly interrupted by heavy static. Vigdis starts fumbling with the switches, tumblers, and levers, trying to re-establish communication.

traits.locale_text: 数分間、兵士たちの楽し気な叫び声とすすり泣きがヴォクスから聞こえてくる。静かな音が突然、大きな雑音で中断される。ヴィグディスはコミュニケーションを再確立しようと、スイッチ、タンブラー、レバーをいじり始める。
数分間、兵士たちの楽し気な叫び声とすすり泣きがヴォクスから聞こえてくる。静かな音が突然、大きな雑音で中断される。ヴィグディスはコミュニケーションを再確立しようと、スイッチ、タンブラー、レバーをいじり始める。

languages.text: Durante unos minutos, los gritos de alegría y los sollozos de los soldados se oyen a través del voco. De repente, los sonidos se ven interrumpidos por una fuerte estática. Vigdis empieza a manipular los interruptores, los botones y las palancas para intentar restablecer la comunicación.
languages.original_text: For a few minutes, joyful cries and sobs of the soldiers are heard over the vox. The muted sounds are suddenly interrupted by heavy static. Vigdis starts fumbling with the switches, tumblers, and levers, trying to re-establish communication.

traits.locale_text: Durante unos minutos, los gritos de alegría y los sollozos de los soldados se oyen a través del voco. De repente, los sonidos se ven interrumpidos por una fuerte estática. Vigdis empieza a manipular los interruptores, los botones y las palancas para intentar restablecer la comunicación.

languages.text: Einige Minuten lang sind über das Vox fröhliche Rufe und Schluchzer der Soldaten zu hören. Die gedämpften Geräusche werden plötzlich von einem lauten Rauschen unterbrochen. Vigdis beginnt, mit den Schaltern und Hebeln herumzuhantieren, um die Verbindung wiederherzustellen.
languages.original_text: For a few minutes, joyful cries and sobs of the soldiers are heard over the vox. The muted sounds are suddenly interrupted by heavy static. Vigdis starts fumbling with the switches, tumblers, and levers, trying to re-establish communication.

traits.locale_text: Einige Minuten lang sind über das Vox fröhliche Rufe und Schluchzer der Soldaten zu hören. Die gedämpften Geräusche werden plötzlich von einem lauten Rauschen unterbrochen. Vigdis beginnt, mit den Schaltern und Hebeln herumzuhantieren, um die Verbindung wiederherzustellen.

Einige Minuten lang sind über das Vox-System glückliche Rufe und Schluchzer der Soldaten zu hören. Die gedämpften Geräusche werden plötzlich von einem lauten Rauschen unterbrochen. Vigdis beginnt, mit den Schaltern und Hebeln herumzuhantieren, um die Verbindung wiederherzustellen.

languages.text: Pendant quelques minutes, le canal-vox résonne au diapason des cris de joie et des sanglots émus des soldats, puis les sons assourdis sont subitement interrompus par des interférences. Vigdis se met à batailler avec la batterie d'interrupteurs, de leviers et de boutons pour tenter de rétablir la communication.
languages.original_text: For a few minutes, joyful cries and sobs of the soldiers are heard over the vox. The muted sounds are suddenly interrupted by heavy static. Vigdis starts fumbling with the switches, tumblers, and levers, trying to re-establish communication.

traits.locale_text: Pendant quelques minutes, le canal-vox résonne au diapason des cris de joie et des sanglots émus des soldats, puis les sons assourdis sont subitement interrompus par des interférences. Vigdis se met à batailler avec la batterie d'interrupteurs, de leviers et de boutons pour tenter de rétablir la communication.

languages.text: Vokstan birkaç dakika boyunca askerlerin neşeli çığlıkları ve hıçkırıkları duyuluyor. Boğuk sesler, aniden yoğun bir parazit ile kesiliyor. Vigdis, iletişimi yeniden kurmak için düğmelerle, mandallarla ve kollarla uğraşmaya başlıyor.
languages.original_text: For a few minutes, joyful cries and sobs of the soldiers are heard over the vox. The muted sounds are suddenly interrupted by heavy static. Vigdis starts fumbling with the switches, tumblers, and levers, trying to re-establish communication.
